seoInfo.title: JSON-LD Structured Data and SEO for LLMs
seoInfo.description: JSON-LD is structured data compliant with Schema.org, serving as a critical component for search engines and AI to understand your content. To ensure proper recognition by Large Language Models, consider the following points:
points: Choose appropriate @type values like WebPage or WebApplication
Accurately describe basic properties like name, description, and url
Utilize FAQPage schema to structure questions and answers
Clearly define publisher and organization information
Combine multiple schemas to provide rich information
seoInfo.conclusion: By implementing proper structured data, LLMs can understand your content more deeply, increasing the likelihood of being cited in search results and AI responses.

overview.title: Overview
overview.content:
Meta Craft for LLM is a free tool that optimizes meta information (titles, descriptions, structures) from SEO and information architecture for Large Language Models (LLMs).
It extracts titles, descriptions, and section structures from web pages or content and automatically converts them into formats useful for prompt design and structured output. This AI-powered structuring tool accelerates LLM utilization in SEO contexts.

steps.title: Enter URL or Text
steps.description: Input the target webpage URL or paste text content directly.

steps.title: Auto-generate Structured & Meta Information
steps.description: AI generates titles, descriptions, heading structures, and tag candidates.

steps.title: Get LLM-optimized Output Format
steps.description: The generated structure is output in a format that can be directly copied and pasted as a prompt.

items.title: Automatically Generate Optimal Prompt Structures for LLMs
items.description: Meta Craft uses a structuring model strong in SEO contexts to extract and convert titles, descriptions, and heading structures all at once. Since it outputs in a format that can be directly passed to LLMs, it significantly reduces the workload of prompt design.

items.title: Format Web Page Structures into "Machine-Readable Form"
items.description: Rather than just extracting text, it analyzes h2/h3 headings and keyword weights to format into a structured form, making it readable for both humans and machines.

items.title: Specialized in Bridging SEO & AI Writing
items.description: A tool that addresses the challenge of wanting to generate SEO structures with LLMs but struggling to provide effective instructions. It complements human design while automatically converting to formats easily understood by LLMs.

items.title: Completely Free & No-Code Ready to Use
items.description: No registration required, just input URLs or text. A no-code AI support tool usable by web managers, editors, and marketers.

questions.question: Q1. What does Meta information refer to?
questions.answer: A. It refers to information that conveys the key points and meaning of a page, such as "title tags," "meta descriptions," "heading structures," and "tag candidates" in web content.

questions.question: Q2. What kind of content is included in the prompt format output?
questions.answer: A. It automatically generates title, description, h2/h3 structure, summary tags, target audience, and more in an LLM-friendly structure.

questions.question: Q3. Can I use it with just a webpage URL?
questions.answer: A. Yes, you can extract and structure information from that page by entering a URL. You can also input text via copy & paste.

questions.question: Q4. Can it be used as an SEO writing tool?
questions.answer: A. Yes, you can use it flexibly, such as using only the automatic generation of structure and headings, then having a human write the rest.

questions.question: Q5. Is the input content saved?
questions.answer: A. No, URLs, text, and output results are not saved and are automatically deleted after a certain period.
